Author: ihatehomedepot
Text: god same, i didn’t know this was a real thing. been out of treatment for 2 weeks, i don’t think my parents ever took my disorder seriously because i never looked super skinny. I am short and i lost about ten pounds and nobody noticed. I would restrict, sometimes as low as 50 cal / a day. i did an intake for a depression clinic and they referred me to their ED program. as long as i eat, they think i am fine. i am not fine and i am just waiting for someone to realize. i don’t know if i really explained it right but i relate to what you’re saying.
